title: commandchest菜单里打开另一个菜单
author: Xuan_Yie
txt_content:
我用菜单插件想在里面打开另一个菜单，但是显示打开之后却立马跳掉了
这是为什么

replies.author: MC_Shenfeng
replies.txt_content:
MC_Shenfeng 发表于 2018-1-26 22:23
item1:
    ID: xxx
    POSITION-X: x
在内容里面插一句
KEEP-OPEN: true

replies.author: f6109011
replies.txt_content: 在config档设定的的ID下方加上KEEP-OPEN: true

replies.author: Xuan_Yie
replies.txt_content:
f6109011 发表于 2018-1-26 06:13
在config档设定的的ID下方加上KEEP-OPEN: true
能发个大概的样子吗？我不确定加哪里

replies.author: MC_Shenfeng
replies.txt_content:
item1:
    ID: xxx
    POSITION-X: x
    POSITION-Y: x
    NAME: 'xxx'
    LORE:
    ENCHANTMENT: 'sharpness, 5; durability, 10; silk touch'
    COLOR: '255, 0, 0'
    SKULL-OWNER: 'filoghost'
    COMMAND: 'xxx'
    PRICE: 1000.0
    KEEP-OPEN: true
